element.short: A set of codes drawn from one or more code systems
element.definition: A value set specifies a set of codes drawn from one or more code systems.

constraint.human: A defined code system (if present) SHALL have a different url than the value set url
Value set SHALL contain at least one of a codeSystem, a compose, or an expansion element
A value set with only one import SHALL also have an include and/or an exclude unless the value set includes and inline code system
constraint.xpath: not(exists(f:compose)) or (count(f:compose/f:import)!=1 or exists(f:compose/f:include) or exists(f:compose/f:exclude) or exists(f:codeSystem))
